title: Krysten Gentile Thrives in the Face of Breast Cancer: Part Two
description:
After going through chemo and radiation, Krysten was finally cancer-free. But about a year later, a new diagnosis changed everything. And now Krysten is making the most of every day — and changing lives along the way.

Follow Krysten on Instagram and Twitter

Check out Krysten’s podcast on Instagram, Twitter, and online — and search for “Making the Breast of It” wherever you get your podcasts

Donate to METAvivor, a charity that gives 100% of donations to metastatic breast cancer research

Listen ad free with Wondery+. Join Wondery+ for exclusives, binges, early access, and ad free listening. Available in the Wondery App. 

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--
